column1: Little Goat Diner////I thought I took a pic of the incredible shrimp and grits but I must have eaten it too fast.  Seriously fantastic.  Lots of fresh shrimp
column3: and cream grits.  Excellent portion.  The little goat latte was innovative with masala and caramel.  The hash-browns were the best I've had
column4: chopped finely like little noodles.  Don't think twice about dining here.  Open table takes reservations!
